snippet.title: Lenovo's ThinkPad X1: the notebook with two brains
snippet.description: ...Throwing another idea at the wall to see if it sticks, Lenovo introduced the ThinkPad X1 Hybrid at the CES Unveiled press pre-CES event here in Las Vegas on January 8.
